editors.name: City Desk Cartographer
editors.tagline: Maps the rumor grid before the presses heat up.
editors.summary: Stabilizes the opening board state by scouting the layout grid and nudging early circulation in the right direction.
editors.hookSummary: Previews critical slots and shapes the first wave of assignments.

onSetup.label: Scout the Grid
onSetup.description: Preview the opening headline slot and tuck a spare lead for later.

onTurnStart.label: Metro Ticker
onTurnStart.description: Peek at the top Truth card each turn; you may keep or cycle it.

editors.name: Night Shift Redactor
editors.tagline: Stamps every revelation with a midnight disclaimer.
editors.summary: The agency-friendly desk that scrubs sensitive material and buries leads until dawn.
editors.hookSummary: Suppresses tempo plays while funneling evidence into the burn bin.

onSetup.label: Mandatory Redaction
onSetup.description: Force both factions to discard and redraw one setup card.

onTurnStart.label: Graveyard Shift
onTurnStart.description: Tax the opponent one Cover-Up whenever Public Frenzy is calm.

onPlayCard.label: Stamp it DENIED
onPlayCard.description: When you play a Response, flip an enemy bonus slot to locked until end of round.

editors.name: Signal Jammer Bureau
editors.tagline: Catches every weird broadcast before it hits the wire.
editors.summary: A paranoiac desk that lives in the radio static, turning surprise transmissions into tactical intel.
editors.hookSummary: Rewards responsive play and amplifies chained reveals.

onTurnStart.label: Frequency Scan
onTurnStart.description: If Public Frenzy is 3+ gain a free Signal token; otherwise draw a clue fragment.

onPlayCard.label: Jam the Feed
onPlayCard.description: After you play a Reaction headline, exhaust a Government support asset.

editors.name: Florida Man Liaison
editors.tagline: Files reports barefoot while the swamp is literally on fire.
editors.summary: Leans into volatile hotspots and weaponises tabloid absurdity from the Sunshine State.
editors.hookSummary: Doubles down on hotspots that are already cooking and converts chaos into momentum.

onSetup.label: Sunshine Surplus
onSetup.description: Start with a Florida story pinned to the rumor board.

onPlayCard.label: Headlines on Fire
onPlayCard.description: When a hotspot is burning, upgrade the next Truth card you play this turn.
